EmailTemplate.name: 2015-IDEF2015-EMEAI-Event.2015IDEF 2015 EMEAI Customer confirmation email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your interest in meeting with Honeywell at IDEF 2015. A Honeywell representative will contact you shortly to schedule a convenient time.
If you are able to attend we look forward to welcoming you to the Honeywell stand 221E at IDEF 2015.
Kind regards
Honeywell Event team.
